author: pauls
msg: Make sure to catch NoClassDefFoundError when trying to query the framework classloader for whether a class is available or not. Previously, it was possible that this query was leaked to bundles because of the error propagate all the way to the bundle that instigated the classload.

author: rdonkin
msg: Switch from deprecated to improved fault handling

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-361 comment sling/sample module in main reactor to prevent breaking the build
